Parallels.ab: vaŋᵛhīm iδāt̰ ādąm vaŋᵛhīm aṣ̌īm = Y68.28 (x2); ~ VrS11.34 vaŋᵛhīmca ādąm vaŋᵛhīmca aṣ̌īm ~ Y52.4 vaŋᵛhīšca aδā̊ vaŋᵛhīšca aṣ̌aiiō.

Nerangs.ab: vaŋᵛhīm iδāt̰ ādąm vaŋᵛhīm aṣ̌īm ǰām ēdōn kū xwaršēd gardēd abar sar ī ān ǰām kē-š āb andar gardēnīdan āca abar āb nica andar wardēnišn mrūmaide purr bē kunišn

"At vaŋᵛhīm iδāt̰ ādąm vaŋᵛhīm aṣ̌īm, he should turn the cup over the rim of the cup that contains the water in the direction in which the sun rotates. At āca, over the water. At nicā, he should turn it around. At mrūmaide, he has to fill it."

Quotations.ab: In the Āb-zōhr with Drōn Yašt, Y68.22-26 are recited in a simiar way, see N53.31a (cf. Kotwal and Kreyenbroek, 2003: pp. 256-7):
vaŋᵛhīm iδāt̰ āδąm vaŋᵛhīm aṣ̌īm āca abar āb nica andar wardēnišn mrūmaide purr be kunišn
"At vaŋᵛhīm iδāt̰ āδąm vaŋᵛhīm aṣ̌īm (he has to hold the bowl) over the water. At nica he has to turn (the zōhr-cup) down. At mrūmaide he has to fill (the water-cup with the zōhr of the zōhr-cup)."
